Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Theophany:

Text.Language: All/louia: all/louia. I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~V]: af[iwmc qen Piiordan/c: all/louia: all/louia.
Alleluia, Alleluia. Jesus Christ, the Son of God, was baptized in the Jordan. Alleluia, Alleluia.
